Now thats an idea I like :)

If you've ever played Total Annihilation you can actually have something
like that happen, except it's missing smoke :)

It might be hard to implement in the current version of glad though, as
trees are basically scenery I think, and you need animations for fire, burnt
trees, etc.
Quite possible for any future versions of gladiator though.

Cya,
Deathifier

----- Original Message -----
From: "Rory Wilde" <laughingmadman@...>
To: <gladiator@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 18, 2001 9:23 AM
Subject: [gladiator] Fire Elementals


> one thing i've wondered about a little in glad, why can't the Fire
elemental
> just walk up to a tree and destroy it, i mean, come on. its fire, the tree
> is wood. burn it down, actually, that could do some interesting things.
like
> your mage makes a small forest, and a fire elemental walks into it, and
sets
> the whole thing on fire. it could release smoke clouds that gradually
drain
> HP from anybody and everybody.
> plus giving the Fire elemental a HP recharge, from absorbing the fire.
